source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dynamic, time-lapse video showcasing a spacious public square centered around a prominent monument with a golden, ornate top. The scene is set under a dramatic, cloudy sky with surrounding trees and buildings. While the focus is on the scenery, there is some minor subject motion, including a boy running across the plaza and people on scooters appearing briefly.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a dynamic, time-lapse video showcasing a spacious public square centered around a prominent monument with a golden, ornate top. The scene is set under a dramatic, cloudy sky with surrounding trees and buildings. While the focus is on the scenery, there is some minor subject motion, including a boy running across the plaza and people on scooters appearing briefly.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly prioritizes describing the static scenery over the motion, which is the primary focus of the instructions. It also uses subjective adjectives like "dynamic" and "dramatic," which are explicitly forbidden. The most significant motion—the time-lapse effect causing clouds to move rapidly and the camera's own movement—is not mentioned. The caption also fails to note the hard cut that changes the camera's perspective. The description of human motion as "minor" is inaccurate; the time-lapse effect makes the movement of people and vehicles a prominent, albeit sped-up, feature. The caption should be rewritten to describe the time-lapse motion of the clouds, the movement of people and vehicles through the square, and the camera's change in position after the cut.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A time-lapse video of a public square. The camera initially moves forward across the paved area towards a central monument, as clouds move rapidly across the sky. People and vehicles are seen moving at high speed through the square. After a hard cut, the perspective shifts to a new position closer to the monument. The time-lapse continues, showing the ongoing movement of clouds and several people with scooters near the monument's base.
